title: Saving Sorell
description: Running from a tortured past, Felix uses discipline and control to survive. Stuck in an abusive relationship, Sorell will do anything to protect his pack.Sorell may only be twenty-three but he knows how bad things can be and he’ll do anything to protect his new pack—his only family. Even if that means ignoring his feelings for the sexy pack doctor, Felix, and staying in a toxic relationship with a dangerous and violent man.Lust brings them together, love will keep them there.Felix wasn’t trying to find love, especially not with a younger man. He’s never been attracted to a man before he met Sorell and he’s still coming to terms with the horrors he witnessed during his last tour as a doctor in rough, foreign lands. The only way he can function is by keeping his days measured and controlled—until he sees Sorell, the only man he’s ever had feelings for, sacrifice himself for the sake of the pack.Will they give in to their urges or will they forfeit their love to guard their pack?Sorell is set on sacrificing his own safety for the greater good, but Felix’s dominant nature is only growing stronger and he’ll face the whole world if that’s what it takes to save Sorell.Saving Sorell is book three of the Wolf’s Mate Mpreg Romance series but can be read as a standalone. It features first time gay tropes and themes involving an exchange of power.
author: Kiki Burrelli
